paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with a higher prevalence in individuals of African descent.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is predominantly found in individuals of documented African descent.
variants.population_frequency: Allele frequency of 0.016 in African population.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is unusual for its overwhelmingly predominant occurrence in individuals of documented African descent.
key_quotes: Among the amyloidogenic TTR pathogenic variants, the point change c.424G>A is unusual for its overwhelmingly predominant occurrence in individuals of documented African descent.

functional_data.summary: The variant is classified as disease-causing.

variants.population_frequency: Allele frequency of 0.0000944 in the Chinese population.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was identified in a study of 10,588 Chinese individuals.
key_quotes: Importantly, 2 variants (allele counts: 2), c.148 > A (p.Val50Met) and c.424G>A (p.Val142Ile) were classified as disease-causing variants according to this study.

tables_processed.table_caption: Minor Allelic Frequency of Disease-Causing Variants in gnomAD
Prevalence of Disease-Causing Variants in the Amcarelab Database

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for TTR variants were extracted successfully.
